chunked_vad.lyrics_text: The Southern wind sings again an island lullaby Baby powder beach under my feet has got me rolling And the breeze through crackling leaves like a daytime campfire burning And the ship is off to sea

And the ship is off to sea And the wake it is a churning As the Southern wind sings again an island lullaby You can jump right in
And the wake it is a churning As the Southern wind sings again an island lullaby You can jump right in Let the music pull you in

You can jump right in Let the music pull you in You can jump right in Oh and lose yourself again
